Package com.epam.facultative.controller.actions

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddAvatarAction, AddCategoryAction, AddCourseAction, AddTeacherAction, AssignAction, AuthAction, CertificateAction, ChangePasswordAction, CoursesAction, DeleteCategoryAction, DeleteCourseAction, DeleteTeacherAction, DownloadCoursesAction, EditStudentAction, EditTeacherAction, EnrollAction, GradeAction, LogOutAction, ManageCategoriesAction, ManageCoursesAction, ManageStudentsAction, ManageTeachersAction, MyCabinetAction, RecoveryPasswordAction, RegisterAction, ShowAllCoursesAction, ShowJournalAction, ShowResultAction, ShowStudentCoursesAction, ShowTeacherCoursesAction, TeachersAction, UpdateBlockAction, UpdateCategoryAction, UpdateCourseAction
public interface Action
Action interface. Implement it to create new actions
Version:
1.0
Author:
Oleksandr Panchenko

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    execute(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
    Obtains path to sendRedirect or forward in front-controller.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      String execute(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp) throws ServiceException, IOException, jakarta.servlet.ServletException
      Obtains path to sendRedirect or forward in front-controller. Edits request and response if needed.
      Parameters:
      req - passed by controller
      resp - passed by controller
      Returns:
      path to return to front-controller
      Throws:
      ServiceException - - any unhandled exception. Will cause front-controller to redirect to error page
      IOException - - any unhandled exception. Will cause front-controller to redirect to error page
      jakarta.servlet.ServletException - - any unhandled exception. Will cause front-controller to redirect to error page
